trends: There have been no other sightings in Pelham
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsUfo appeared out of nowhere hovered and then zoomed off in the blink of an eye. Soon after a Jet and then a black helicopter appeared in the area and I was asked if I saw anything by some random guy in a black lexus I said no and asked w"why are you looking for something and he said "No I thought I saw a fox" there are no foxes around here guy looked like an fbi agent or something.
Summary: Ufo appeared out of nowhere hovered and then zoomed off in the blink of an eye
